name: Flippy Blob
description:
An unnamed blue bird must navigate through a series of mysteriously placed pipes in the sky. Also a sun in the background is cheering you on! Go you! 

This is a completely original game idea.

This is my first project ever - please don't judge : ] 
My goal was to develop skills in art, UI, and most importantly, programming. I'm satisfied with the basics I've come to understand, so I'm just keeping this here as a reminder of the first milestones that I've reached. Now its onto my second project!

Sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

"Bit Shift" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Balloon Game" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
